lead_paragraph: By now, plenty of traditional media companies have hopped on the social media bandwagon, pumping out news updates on Facebook and Twitter, Jenna Wortham writes in The New York Times.
snippet: Following Facebook and Twitter's success, Tumblr, a fast-growing blogging service based in New York, has attracted interest from major news organizations.

headline.main: Meet Tumblr, Facebook and Twitter's New Rival

abstract: Following Facebook and Twitter's success, Tumblr, a fast-growing blogging service based in New York, has attracted interest from major news organizations.
